findMoveLocations

public java.util.Vector<MapTile> findMoveLocations()
Method to gather the tiles that this unit can move to, calls recursive method addLocations(Map map, int x, int y, int depth) to do so.

Parameters:

Overrides:
draw in class GameEntity
Parameters:
